snippet: "Americans are the only people in the world known to me whose status anxiety prompts them to advertise their college and university affiliations in the rear windows of their automobiles," Paul Fussell once wrote.
abstract: "Americans are the only people in the world known to me whose status anxiety prompts them to advertise their college and university affiliations in the rear windows of their automobiles," Paul Fussell once wrote.

headline.main: What Those College Stickers on the Rear Window Say About America
